author: ReferSMS Partner
content: Actress Disha Patani steals the spotlight on the return flight from Italy, where the shoot for "Kalki 2898 AD" is underway. Patani shares a photo capturing Prabhas, her co-star, during the journey. The film, a mega-budget venture produced by Aswani Dutt, also stars Amitabh Bachchan and Kamal Haasan. "Kalki 2898 AD" is slated for a May 9th release.
title: Disha captures Prabhas: Moments from return flight from Italy!

author: Pankaj
content: The 3-day pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani & Radhika Merchant attracted unprecedented attention on social media. Videos of stars descending to Jamnagar flooded timelines, among which was a video showing Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma, and image of Elon Musk, all purportedly attending the event. But the video was found to be old and the image AI generated.
title: AI Musk Image, Old Video of Virat-Anushka Linked To Ambani Bash

author: Purushottam
content: Google & Indian app developers have agreed to pause their dispute over Google's billing policy for 4 months. Shaadi was among the affected apps, but after intervention from Indian government officials, most delisted apps, including Shaadi.com, were reinstated. Anupam Mittal, CEO of People Group, thanked union ministers for their help and emphasized the importance of finding a fair solution.
title: Google Pauses Indian Apps Billing Dispute for 4 Months

author: ReferSMS Partner
content: Sidharth Malhotra and Raashii Khanna's enchanting duet 'Tere Sang Ishq Hua' is now available! Produced by Dharma Productions, this collaboration with Arijit Singh sets the mood for their upcoming film 'Yodha,' hitting cinemas on March 15th. The song captures their chemistry, promising a romantic journey. Fans eagerly anticipate the film's release alongside this captivating melody.
title: Sidharth & Raashii’s romantic ballad ‘Tere Sang Ishq Hua’ out now

author: Daisy Mowke
content: During Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding celebrations, Radhika delivered a speech on the significance of marriage. However, social media users pointed out that it had a resemblance to a dialogue from the 2004 film 'Shall We Dance?' starring Susan Sarandon. Reacting to a video pointing out the resemblance, a person wrote, "That's quite embarrassing."
title: Radhika Merchant's pre-wedding speech allegedly copied from movie dialogue, video viral

author: Ashima Mahindra
content: Gal Gadot shared the news of birth of her fourth child on Instagram The actor said her 4th pregnancy was not easy. "My sweet girl, welcome. The pregnancy was not easy, and we made it through," Gadot wrote. Even though she has not explained what health issues she faced, Gadot has been open about severe migraine she had earlier.
title: Could migraine be behind Gal Gadot's difficult 4th pregnancy?

author: Pallavi Soni
content: Parineeti Chopra's latest appearance has left fans wondering if she is expecting her first child with husband Raghav Chadha. The actress was recently spotted wearing an oversized white shirt with shorts. In the past, many actresses have tried to hide their baby bump by wearing oversized clothes. Hence, netizens wonder if Parineeti is hiding her pregnancy before making it official.
title: Is Parineeti Chopra expecting her first child with Raghav?

author: Shreyansh Jain
content: Adil Khan Durrani, known for his tumultuous past with Rakhi Sawant, has reportedly entered into wedlock with former Bigg Boss 12 contestant Somi Khan. The couple has chosen to remain tight-lipped about their union, refraining from any official statements. According to a report by ETimes, Adil and Somi exchanged vows in a discreet ceremony attended by their close circle.
title: Who is Adil Khan Durrani's new wife after Rakhi Sawant?

author: ReferSMS Partner
content: Tomorrow, the first song 'Baby Bring It On' from 'Madgaon Express' will be unveiled. The film, directed by Kunal Kemmu and produced by Ritesh Sidhwani and Farhan Akhtar, features Divyenndu, Pratik Gandhi, Avinash Tiwary, Nora Fatehi, Upendra Limaye, and Chhaya Kadam in the lead roles. The movie hits cinemas on March 22, 2024.
title: First Song: ‘Baby Bring It On’ from ‘Madgaon Express’ out tomorrow

author: Pallavi Soni
content: During the pre-wedding celebrations, Radhika Merchant conveyed her deep affection and admiration for Anant Ambani through a touching speech. However, some netizens have drawn parallels between Radhika's speech and dialogue from Susan Sarandon's character in 2004 film Shall We Dance? In the film, Sarandon delivers a monologue resonating with similar themes of companionship and essence of marriage.
title: Did Radhika Merchant copy her pre-wedding speech for Anant?
